name: antoine
cooked: In some word region, if you are a professional, and if you publish the documentation of your TMA (Thing Made with Atom) available for individuals, then you are responsible for individual usages, even if the licence you choose tells you are not. However, if you make your documentation available only for professionals, then professionals are said to know what they do, and you will not be responsible for usage done by professionals.
